metadata.title: CVE-2018-17433 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A heap-based buffer overflow in ReadGifImageDesc() in gifread.c in the HDFHDF5 through 1.10.3 library allows attackers to cause a denial of servicevia a crafted HDF5 file. This issue was triggered while converting a GIFfile to an HDF file.

criterions.comment: hdf5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
